name: Infernal YO-HO
description:
Infernal YO-HO  is a physics-based platformer where you jump from rocking ship to rocking ship to avoid being eaten by a shark.

How far can you go?

This game was submitted as an entre for the Ludum Dare 49, the theme was "Unstable"

Credits:

Thomas B: Art, Animation and Level Design

Florian G: Programming and Level Design

Rom B: Programming and Sound Design
